entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
